Articles.Content:
Salutations.

Here\'s another \'survey\' thread (I\'ve been making a lot lately.)

The topic:

Favourite Sports Teams!

All you have to do is write the teams location and name, and then their sport (and if they\'re not a major, their league. I.e. NCAA.)

Like this:

Toronto Blue Jays, Baseball

List as many as you\'d like.

Here are mine:

New York Yankees, Baseball

Montreal Canadiens, Hockey

Canada, Curling

USA Blue, Sport Stacking

Buffalo Bills, Football

Montreal Alouettes, Canadian Football

The goal here is to get people to discuss their favourite teams without raging.

Any flame wars will result in an immediate locking of the thread, with the guilty party named.

DISCUSS!

South Sydney Rugby Leage team of the NFL

(Glory, glory to South Sydney!)

Football: Philadelphia Eagles

Baceball: Philadelphia Phillies

Hockey: Philadelphia Flyers

As you can see I live near Philadelphia

Football: Philadelphia Eagles

Baceball: Philadelphia Phillies

Hockey: Philadelphia Flyers

As you can see I live near Philadelphia

My replies:

Football, Mike Vick, meh otherwise.

Baseball (I C WUT U DID THAR), I agree. They are quite good, but need a touch more balance.

Hockey, BOO! (For philly booing santa [despite my judaism] and \'cuz I\'m a Habby)

Damn, there needs to be a special bracket for when you need to place a bracket inside another.

My replies:

Football, Mike Vick, meh otherwise.

Baseball (I C WUT U DID THAR), I agree. They are quite good, but need a touch more balance.

Hockey, BOO! (For philly booing santa [despite my judaism] and \'cuz I\'m a Habby)

Damn, there needs to be a special bracket for when you need to place a bracket inside another.

I don\'t really follow any of them

BTW, you can use {this} for further bracketception

Chicago Blackhawks! ...Hockey

Chicago Bears! ...Football

Chicago Bulls! ...Basketball

All Blacks! ...Rugby

All Whites! ...Soccer

Out of all of them, my favorite is by far the Blackhawks. Although where they got 64 points from; I have absolutely no idea. =P

I don\'t really follow any of them

BTW, you can use {this} for bracketception

All Black (Rugby)

Silver Firns (Netball)

All Whites : Football (not american football, Proper football)

NZ Cricket Team.
